author: randyk
msg: Adjust Win32 targets so as to build with recent commits. The main
change is to build libapreq2 as a dll now, rather than a static lib.

author: randyk
msg: On Win32, no longer need to link against mod_apreq.

author: joes
msg: Start 2.0.1 development with CGI as default module (embedded into libapreq2), and introduce new runtime API for setting up alternate environments.  This should make it a bit easier to port libapreq to non-ELF platforms (eg. Win32).  All current tests should still pass.

author: striker
msg: SECURITY [CAN-2003-0789]: mod_cgid: Resolve some mishandling of
the AF_UNIX socket used to communicate with the cgid daemon and
